# [Interview #576, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=576#1)

#### Terez

I put all the quotes in the database earlier but I figured I'd do a roundup. There are a few questions I didn't include either because they weren't WoT-related or because I didn't find them to be all that relevant to our HCFF interests. They are footnoted and slightly edited for prettiness.
